title: Do you like this multiplier config for Destruction (Layer 4)?
body:
After listening to the community through different means, we proposed the following configuration for native and non-native multipliers.

This configuration proposes a ratio of:
Native: 64.03%.
Non-natives: 35.97%.

The configuration of multipliers would be:

Token / Multiplier / Percentile
-------------------------------------
destruction - usdc / 120 / 22.60%.
destruction - matic / 120 / 22.60%
destruction / 100 / 18.83%.

usdc - matic / 20 / 3.77%
usdc - usdt / 16 / 3.01%
usdc - eth / 16 / 3.01%
matic - eth / 18 / 3.39%
wmatic / 20 / 3.77%
dai / 15 / 2.82%
weth / 18 / 3.39%
wbtc / 18 / 3.39%
usdc / 20 / 3.77%
delirium / 10 / 1.88%
despair / 10 / 1.88%
link / 10 / 1.88%
author: 0xC32320520beCEdbb90EA79A837BA723e61Cf35ed
